1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 PACKAGE = 'amr_localization'
4 NODE = 'particle_visualizer'
5 
6 import roslib
7 roslib.load_manifest(PACKAGE)
8 import rospy
9 import tf
10 import math
11 from amr_localization.motion_model import MotionModel
12 from amr_localization.pose import Pose
13 from amr_localization.particle import Particle
14 from amr_localization.random_particle_generator import RandomParticleGenerator
15 from visualization_msgs.msg import Marker, MarkerArray
16 
17 class ParticleVisualizer:
18 
19  def __init__(self, topic_name, frame_id):
20  self.topic_name = topic_name
21  self.frame_id = frame_id
22  self.marker_publisher = rospy.Publisher(topic_name, MarkerArray)
23 
24  def publish(self, particles):
25  min_val = min(particles).weight
26  max_val = max(particles).weight
27  range = (max_val-min_val)*0.9
28  markers = MarkerArray()
29  for p in particles:
30  marker = Marker()
31  marker.ns = "particles"
32  marker.header.frame_id = self.frame_id;
33  marker.type = Marker.ARROW
34  marker.action = Marker.ADD
35  marker.scale.x = 0.6;
36  marker.scale.y = 0.1;
37  marker.scale.z = 0.2;
38  if range > 0:
39  marker.color.a = 0.1 + (p.weight - min_val) / range
40  else:
41  marker.color.a = 1.0
42  marker.color.r = 0.0;
43  marker.color.g = 0.2;
44  marker.color.b = 0.8;
45  quat = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0.0, 0.0, p.pose.theta)
46  marker.pose.orientation.x = quat[0]
47  marker.pose.orientation.y = quat[1]
48  marker.pose.orientation.z = quat[2]
49  marker.pose.orientation.w = quat[3]
50  marker.pose.position.x = p.pose.x;
51  marker.pose.position.y = p.pose.y;
52  marker.pose.position.z = 0.05;
53  marker.id = len(markers.markers);
54  markers.markers.append(marker);
55  self.marker_publisher.publish(markers)
